Talks.Title: üß† Augment Minds 2021
Talks.Description: An (un)conference on advancing technologies in the tools for thought space, and delightful innovations in HCI for complementing thought. Delivered a lightning talk on a plaintext Zettelkasten system and my toolkit of choice: Vim, FZF, RipGrep, and Ctags.
